collection.name: The Dreaming Current
collection.openText: Tell the kid today's treat is going to be grape-flavored candy. It's his favorite.

specialTipSize.specialTip: When employee #0 panicked during work, the Qliphoth Counter lowered.
When an employee with Temperance Level 1 finished their work, the Qliphoth Counter lowered.

The pools of liquid that profused certain sections of the facility while $0 escaped drastically inhibited the movement of employees and dealt RED damage over time. However, the employees’ SP healed over time.
